project.name: Compiles TAW clients assets
project.description:
A suite of ant tasks that may be used to compile a working Earth Eternal client from the source files.
The tasks can compile :-
* XML Mesh files to Mesh * MP3 and WAV to OGG * Squirrel NUT to compiled bytecode (CNUT)
It also has tasks for CAR encoding (from zip files), and all compilers are incremental, so will only compile to target files where the source modification time differs.
